categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Balog was a male Chiss officer serving the reconstituted Sith Empire in 3638 BBY. He was part of the Imperial strike force during the Conquest of Makeb, and led a small team in raiding the settlement of Tarlam for information, taking Mayor Erkens hostage for a short time.
Balog first appeared in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, a digital expansion released in 2012 for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
